languages.text: "Указом Вольного Торговца Регина Зауэрбэк приговаривается к смерти за ересь и преступления против торговой династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Указом вольного торговца мы казним Регину Заурбэк!

languages.text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"
languages.original_text: "Указом Вольного Торговца Регина Зауэрбэк приговаривается к смерти за ересь и преступления против торговой династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerbeck is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"
"By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerbeck is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"
"By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerbeck is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"
"By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerbeck is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

languages.text: "Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird Regina Sauerback hiermit wegen Ketzerei und Verbrechen gegen die Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius zum Tode verurteilt!"
languages.original_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Auf Befehl {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} wird Regina Sauerbeck hiermit wegen Ketzerei und Verbrechen gegen die Handelsdynastie derer von Valancius zum Tode verurteilt!"

languages.text: « Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Régina Sauerback est condamnée à mort pour hérésie et crimes contre la dynastie commerciale von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: « Sur ordre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Régina Sauerback est condamnée à mort pour hérésie et crimes contre la dynastie commerciale von Valancius ! »

languages.text: «¡Por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, Regina Sauerback queda condenada a muerte por herejía y crímenes contra la dinastía comercial von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Por orden {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, Regina Sauerback queda condenada a muerte por herejía y crímenes contra la dinastía comercial von Valancius!».

languages.text: “行商浪人有令，蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克涉嫌犯下异端恶行，意图危害冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝，现判处死刑！”
languages.original_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人有令，蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克涉嫌犯下异端恶行，意图危害冯·瓦兰修斯贸易王朝，现判处死刑！”

languages.text: 「自由開拓者の命により、レジーナ・ザウアーバックに異端の罪とフォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝への反逆罪で死刑を宣告する！」
languages.original_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者の命により、レジーナ・ザウアーバックに異端の罪とフォン・ヴァランシウス貿易王朝への反逆罪で死刑を宣告する！」

languages.text: "Regina Sauerback, kâfirlikten ve von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığına karşı işlediği suçlardan dolayı Hür Tacir'in emriyle idama mahkûm edilmiştir!"
languages.original_text: "By order of the Rogue Trader, Regina Sauerback is sentenced to death for heresy and crimes against the von Valancius trade dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Regina Sauerbeck, kâfirlik etmek ve von Valancius ticaret hanedanlığına karşı suç işlemek saiklerinden Hür Tacir'in emriyle ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir!"
